article_text:
China’s lawyers are being picked off by the dozen, abducted by a shadowy group that operates beyond the reach of the law—that is, by the Chinese police.

One of the first of the more than 50 lawyers and legal activists to be grabbed since Thursday was Zhou Shifeng of the Beijing Fengrui Law Firm. Mr. Zhou represented journalist Zhang Miao, who was locked up for nine months without charge after reporting on the Hong Kong pro-democracy...

twitter.description: China’s tactic: If you can’t beat them, abduct them. An editorial in The Wall Street Journal.
twitter.title: Beijing Locks Up the Lawyers
